name: Somebodies Bad Day (WIP)
description:
Game developed for the Ukie Raise the game jam 2020

Overview:
Every day gets more frustrating, the people around you just don't seem to understand you, you must take out your rage before it becomes too much to bear.

Controls:
WASD to move
Mouse to rotate
R to rewind time
Left click to kill when in range

Goal:
As time goes on you gain more and more bloodlust and must kill the people of the town to survive.

Developed by:

  • Ang Hill
  • Hal Rear
  • John Whiles
  • Chris Wolyniec
  • Rhiannon Powell
  • Taylor Fahy

Using art assets from:
Polygon town pack by Synty Studios and UI Kit #4 by Wenerexa
